item.title: Kate add a quote by Robin McKinley
item.description: "The train is roaring toward you and the villain is twirling his moustache and you're fussing that he's tied you to the tracks with the wrong kind of rope." -- Robin McKinley

item.title: Kate add a quote by Robin McKinley
item.description: "I don't put up with being messed around, and I don't suffer fools gladly. The short version of that is that I'm a bitch. Trust me, I can provide character references." -- Robin McKinley

item.title: Kate add a quote by Georgette Heyer
Kate add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "You're a prefect? Oh Ronnie! That's everyone in the family!" "What are Fred and I? Next door neighbors?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kate add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "If my doctor told me I had only six minutes to live, I wouldn't brood. I'd type a little faster." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Kate add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Books make great gifts because they have whole worlds inside of them. And it's much cheaper to buy somebody a book than it is to buy them the whole world!" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Kate add a quote by Nicole Peeler
item.description: "...some heroes are born. Some are made. And some are bribed with promises of food and sex." -- Nicole Peeler

item.title: Kate add a quote by Nicole Peeler
item.description: "The way I saw it, one of the single greatest advantages of being in a relationship was that you got to eat off the other person's plate." -- Nicole Peeler

item.title: Kate add a quote by Nicole Peeler
item.description: "I was pretty sure I'd just had a nerdgasm." -- Nicole Peeler

item.title: Kate add a quote by Max Gladstone
item.description: "The trouble with atheism," Temoc said, "is that it offers a limited range of curses." -- Max Gladstone
